price: 6. Nabiyow a-Qhuraan kol kah oobisnem abbobti как meesiisime wayte mara edde meesissuh, usun iimaanak garcit yanin.
arabic: لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: litundhira qawman mā undhira ābāuhum fahum ghāfilūna
